name: jss-placement-portal
description: Complete JSS Placement Portal with AI Integration

scripts.build: cd placement-portal/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd placement-portal/backend && npm run dev" "cd placement-portal/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd placement-portal/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Vikas T. G.
